properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , MEM_POST , MEM_ADDR , GENDER , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_PROFILE , INTEREST , GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , MEM_UPDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_DROP FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , MEM_POST , MEM_ADDR , GENDER , MEM_BIRTH , INTEREST , GRADE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MBNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 1 )
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PROFILE = ? WHERE MEM_NO = SEQ_MBNO.CURRVAL
